field.label: MOD_QLFORM_XML_LABEL
field.default: [form] [fieldset name="fieldset1"] [field name="name" label="Name" type="text" required="true" /] [field name="email" label="E-mail" type="email" required="true" validate="email" /] [field name="subject" label="Subject" type="text" /] [field name="message" label="Message" type="textarea" required="true" /] [/fieldset] [/form]
